commitResults.messageBody:
Rename Duke.java to Duck.java

Edit Skeleton Duke.java Code

Echo user commands

Exits when user types bye

NewList.java : Use ArrayList to manage and build list

Item.java : Object that stores input text. These objects will be stored to ArrayList in NewList.java

Duck.java : Main code that invokes NewList.java methods

NewList.java : Add markUnmarkItem class to change status of task

Item.java : Add private boolean variable 'done' which is true when marked, false when unmarked

Include Error Handling Code in the events where:

1) User marks/unmarks task number that does not exist

2) User marks a task that has been marked

3) User unmarks a task that has not been marked

TaskType.java : Enum declaration

Item.java : Use Enum

Duck.java : String Processing to extract ToDo, Event and Deadline Information

Item.java : Add support for ToDo, Event, Deadline Enum

Use IO Redirection Technique to automate testing of Duck

Edit runtest.bat , input.txt , EXPECTED.TXT , ACTUAL.TXT

Duck.java : Reformat code to use else if instead of multiple nested-if statements

Duck.java : Add Error Handling Code. More Info in JavaDocs

NewList.java : Add DeleteItem functionality

Duck.java: Support for DeleteItem, DeleteItem Error Handling

Duck.java : Edit mark/unmark code to include more error handling cases
Update to include more test cases

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Missing Information in Command List
commitResults.messageBody: Duck.java : Add explanation for Delete and bye in Command List
